mapper.insert: INSERT INTO consult_match( matchno, consultno, matched_consultno, match_score, created_at ) VALUES ( consult_match_seq.NEXTVAL, #{consultno}, #{matchedConsultno}, #{matchScore}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT matchno, consultno, matched_consultno AS matchedConsultno, match_score AS matchScore, created_at FROM consult_match WHERE consultno = #{value} ORDER BY match_score DESC
